verses.verse: Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> <S%H8035>Shem,<s%> <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> and <S%H3315>Japheth:<s%> and to them were <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3999>flood.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3315>Japheth;<s%> <S%H1586>Gomer,<s%> and <S%H4031>Magog,<s%> and <S%H4074>Madai,<s%> and <S%H3120>Javan,<s%> and <S%H8422>Tubal,<s%> and <S%H4902>Meshech,<s%> and <S%H8493>Tiras.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1586>Gomer;<s%> <S%H813>Ashkenaz,<s%> and <S%H7384>Riphath,<s%> and <S%H8425>Togarmah.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3120>Javan;<s%> <S%H473>Elishah,<s%> and <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> <S%H3794>Kittim,<s%> and <S%H1721>Dodanim.<s%>

By <S%H428>these<s%> were the <S%H339>isles<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> <S%H6504>divided<s%> in their <S%H776>lands;<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> after his <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> in their <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham;<s%> <S%H3568>Cush,<s%> and <S%H4714>Mizraim,<s%> and <S%H6316>Phut,<s%> and <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3568>Cush;<s%> <S%H5434>Seba,<s%> and <S%H2341>Havilah,<s%> and <S%H5454>Sabtah,<s%> and <S%H7484>Raamah,<s%> and <S%H5455>Sabtechah:<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7484>Raamah;<s%> <S%H7614>Sheba,<s%> and <S%H1719>Dedan.<s%>
And <S%H3568>Cush<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H5248>Nimrod:<s%> he <S%H2490>began<s%> to be a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> one in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

He was a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H6718>hunter<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H5921>why<s%> <S%H3651><s%> it is <S%H559>said,<s%> Even as <S%H5248>Nimrod<s%> the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H6718>hunter<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of his <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> was <S%H894>Babel,<s%> and <S%H751>Erech,<s%> and <S%H390>Accad,<s%> and <S%H3641>Calneh,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar.<s%>

Out of that <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H804>Asshur,<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H5210>Nineveh,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H7344>Rehoboth,<s%> and <S%H3625>Calah,<s%>
And <S%H7449>Resen<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> and <S%H3625>Calah:<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> is a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city.<s%>
And <S%H4714>Mizraim<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H3866>Ludim,<s%> and <S%H6047>Anamim,<s%> and <S%H3853>Lehabim,<s%> and <S%H5320>Naphtuhim,<s%>
And <S%H6625>Pathrusim,<s%> and <S%H3695>Casluhim,<s%> (out of <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H6430>Philistim,<s%>) and <S%H3732>Caphtorim.<s%>
And <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H6721>Sidon<s%> his first <S%H1060>born,<s%> and <S%H2845>Heth,<s%>
And the <S%H2983>Jebusite,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> and the <S%H1622>Girgasite,<s%>
And the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> and the <S%H6208>Arkite,<s%> and the <S%H5513>Sinite,<s%>

And the <S%H721>Arvadite,<s%> and the <S%H6786>Zemarite,<s%> and the <S%H2577>Hamathite:<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> were the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H6327>spread<s%> <S%H5310>abroad.<s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> was from <S%H6721>Sidon,<s%> as you <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1642>Gerar,<s%> to <S%H5804>Gaza;<s%> as you <S%H935>go,<s%> to <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> and <S%H126>Admah,<s%> and <S%H6636>Zeboim,<s%> even to <S%H3962>Lasha.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> after their <S%H3956>tongues,<s%> in their <S%H776>countries,<s%> and in their <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

To <S%H8035>Shem<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5677>Eber,<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3315>Japheth<s%> the <S%H1419>elder,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> to him were children <S%H3205>born.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem;<s%> <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> and <S%H804>Asshur,<s%> and <S%H775>Arphaxad,<s%> and <S%H3865>Lud,<s%> and <S%H758>Aram.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H758>Aram;<s%> <S%H5780>Uz,<s%> and <S%H2343>Hul,<s%> and <S%H1666>Gether,<s%> and <S%H4851>Mash.<s%>
And <S%H775>Arphaxad<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H7974>Salah;<s%> and <S%H7974>Salah<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H5677>Eber.<s%>

And to <S%H5677>Eber<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons:<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H6389>Peleg;<s%> for in his <S%H3117>days<s%> was the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6385>divided;<s%> and his <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3355>Joktan.<s%>
And <S%H3355>Joktan<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H486>Almodad,<s%> and <S%H8026>Sheleph,<s%> and <S%H2700>Hazarmaveth,<s%> and <S%H3392>Jerah,<s%>
And <S%H1913>Hadoram,<s%> and <S%H187>Uzal,<s%> and <S%H1853>Diklah,<s%>
And <S%H5745>Obal,<s%> and <S%H39>Abimael,<s%> and <S%H7614>Sheba,<s%>
And <S%H211>Ophir,<s%> and <S%H2341>Havilah,<s%> and <S%H3103>Jobab:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3355>Joktan.<s%>
And their <S%H4186>dwelling<s%> was from <S%H4331>Mesha,<s%> as you <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H5611>Sephar<s%> a <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H6924>east.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> after their <S%H3956>tongues,<s%> in their <S%H776>lands,<s%> after their <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> after their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> in their <S%H1471>nations:<s%> and by <S%H428>these<s%> were the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6504>divided<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3999>flood.<s%>
